item.title: About
item.description: My name is Francesco Giordano and I’m an Italian Security Researcher and Developer. I also play CTF with JBZ Team. Here you can find my Writeup, Rants, Projects and Disclosures. (Mostly Rants :P)

item.title: XSS via unsanitized markdown output in pastebin.com and reddit.com
item.description: We all love Markdown, right? It’s a fast and user-friendly way to beautify our documentation. Well, all that glitters is not gold, in this case not for system administrators. Some time ago playing the Hack.lu 2017 CTF event with my team we solved an interesting challenge called Mitsune were a misconfigured instance of mitsune was given and we had to send a malicious link containing an XSS payload to an administrator to steal their cookies.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World! package main import fmt func main(){ fmt.Println("Hello World!") }
